faqQaList.question: 1. What is the My Rewards feature of the app?
faqQaList.answer: My Rewards enables users to earn points with repeated use of the different features of Pulse. You can view how many points you have earned and later exchange these for cool and exciting rewards.

faqQaList.question: 2. How will I be able to use these points?
faqQaList.answer: Your points can be used to claim exciting rewards that will soon be added to the Pulse app. Stay tuned for further announcements.

faqQaList.question: 3. How do I earn more points?
faqQaList.answer:
You may earn more points by using and completing Pulse features. There are corresponding points for use of the different features of the app. 
Complete Healthcheck 15 points 
Use Symptom Checker 5 points 
Refer a Friend 2 points 
Note: 
Additional points will soon be added to other Pulse features. 
Point system might also change favorably as we improve our future rewards.

faqQaList.question: 4. I have completed Healthcheck and used Symptom Checker previously, will I earn points for those activities?
faqQaList.answer: No. You will only earn points from your activities starting the date that will be informed soon.

faqQaList.question: 5. Where can I view the points I have earned?
faqQaList.answer: You can check your points by clicking Account on your app, then go to My Rewards and you can view the total points you've earned in My Reward Wallet, including a detailed summary or your rewards points.

faqQaList.question: 6. How long will it take for points to be posted to my account?
faqQaList.answer: You should receive points in your account immediately once you complete a Pulse feature.

faqQaList.question: 7. Will my points expire?
faqQaList.answer: No. Your My Rewards points will never expire and will continue to accumulate.

faqQaList.question: 8. Does it cost anything to begin earning points?
faqQaList.answer: Download and use of the Pulse app is free. Once you've registered to the app, you immediately earn 2 points and will continue to earn points with continued use of the app.

faqQaList.question: 9. Can I transfer points to a friend?
faqQaList.answer: Points are non-transferable. All points are awarded every Pulse user through continued use of the different Pulse features.

elements.label: Please check back here regularly after taking up a few activities in Pulse.
We are happy to expand our Pulse family and we thank you for helping us extend it. We would like to show our loyalty by rewarding you for the same. Get rewarded for every referral.

rewardProgressList.desc: You have reacthed 30 referrals. You will earn 1 badge for every 4 referrals going forward

  2. Each Redemption Code is valid for one (1) time use only and is only applicable to users who has not registered with PULSE (“new PULSE user”). Each new PULSE user is only entitled to one (1) Redemption Code.
  3. AirAsia BIG and Prudential reserve the right to request from you any documentation for verification purposes.
  4. AirAsia BIG and Prudential also reserve the right to vary these Terms and Conditions at any time without prior notice. The latest version of the terms and conditions take precedence over all previous versions of the terms and conditions and shall prevail over any provision or representations contained in any other promotional materials relating to this Redemption Code.
  5. For full terms and conditions, please refer to "BIG Pulse Download Campaign" page in AirAsia BIG website at: https://www.airasiabig.com/my/en/financial_services/details/big-pulse-download-campaign

To redeem the AirAsia BIG Points Redemption Code containing 250 AirAsia BIG Points, kindly select "BIG Points Code" at the home page in the BIG Loyalty app or web. Proceed to enter the AirAsia BIG Points Redemption Code accordingly.
To redeem this Redemption Code, kindly select "Redemption Code" in the profile page in the Boost app. Proceed to enter the Redemption Code accordingly.
To redeem this Promo Code, kindly select "Promo Code" in the payment mode page in the GSC app / web. Proceed to enter the Promo Code accordingly.
